title: Cannabis Dispensary in Grand Rapids, Michigan | Exclusive
text: Grand Rapids: Top Sellers Popular Flower Popular Pre-Rolls Popular Vaporizers Popular Edibles Popular Concentrates ITEMS ON SALE Exclusive Grand Rapids Cannabis Dispensary EVERYDAY BETWEEN 9AM and 9PM delivery: 09:00 AM to 09:00 PM Exclusive Grand Rapids Dispensary Attractions - John Ball Zoo ( 19 min from Dispensary ) - Frederik Meijer Gardens & Sculpture Park ( 14 min from Dispensary ) - Grand Rapids Public Museum ( 13 min from Dispensary ) - Woodland Mall ( 4 min from Dispensary ) - Calvin University ( 6 min from Dispensary ) Shop Grand Rapids’ Go-To Dispensary No matter what you’re looking for, you’ll find something that fits both your lifestyle and budget at Exclusive’s Grand Rapids dispensary. It’s our mission to connect you with the products you love and at prices you love even more, so we keep our shelves fully stocked with Michigan’s best bud. From potent concentrates to fragrant flower and everything in between, if you’ve been on the hunt for your new favorite dispensary, your search ends here! Conveniently located on 29th Street, just off of Breton Rd, our Grand Rapids dispensary offers plenty of on-site parking, an in-store ATM, lucrative daily deals, a generous rewards program, cannabis delivery and pickup options, and so much more! At Exclusive, you’re always treated like a VIP. Get Exclusive Access to Michigan’s Best Cannabis We take cannabis seriously, which is why we go out of our way to source the best products from Michigan’s most reputable brands. Visit our Grand Rapids dispensary today and explore a huge selection of premium cannabis—our friendly budtenders can help guide you to new favorites or just stock up on all your go-to’s. Even better? We don’t just love cannabis; we grow and manufacture some of it, too! Our extensive range of brands includes Strain Kings, Terpene Tanks, Kushy Punch, Church Cannabis Company, and Platinum Vape. You can rest easy knowing that when you choose us, you choose our dedication to quality. Score Deals Every Day of the Week Looking to save some extra dough? Look no further! Our lineup of generous deals includes daily and weekly specials, regular discounts for students and veterans, birthday savings, and more lucrative deals! Stop by the shop and see how much you can save, or browse our online menu for the full deals rundown. Earn Rewards and Become an Exclusive VIP We’re proud of the many 5-star reviews we’ve earned over the years, and to show our appreciation for our loyal customers and cannabis community, we’re giving back with our Exclusive VIP Rewards program. Sign up today for one of the most generous rewards programs in the state and start earning points on each and every purchase. Plus, once you become a member, you’ll recieve a one-time 20% discount on all recreational products. Get the Exclusive App for Seamless Shopping For a more personalized shopping experience and even more savings, download the Exclusive app. You can access incredible app-only deals, save the products you love for future reference, discover new favorites, skip the line when you order for pickup, and automatically receive rewards points for every purchase. Order Online for Convenient Delivery and Curbside Pickup Crunched for time or can’t leave the house? We’re here for you! For the ultimate convenience, choose in-store or curbside pickup, or get quality cannabis sent right to your door! Our home delivery service from our Grand Rapids dispensary reaches a 20-mile radius and is available from 9:00 am – 9:00 pm daily with the following ordering fees: - $14.99 fee for orders between $50 – $69.99 - $9.99 fee for orders between $70 – $99.99 - $4.99 fee for all orders of $100 or more To get started, head to our online menu or order with the Exclusive app—you can load up your cart and then choose pickup or delivery at checkout. We’ll send you text updates with an approximate delivery time or when your pickup order is ready. Grand Rapids Dispensary Areas Served EXCLUSIVE CANNABIS REVIEWS HAVE ANY QUESTIONS? SEND US A MESSAGE Shop Exclusive Grand Rapids Today Ready to experience your new favorite cannabis dispensary in Grand Rapids? Stop by today and find the best products in town, along with a welcoming team of top-rated budtenders, or check out our online menu and get all your go-to products delivered right to your door! JOIN OUR VIP MAILING LIST Get access to exclusive rewards, discounts, promotions and more exclusive news!
